conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway conversion with consistent geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls rendered with accurate height and thickness; clean isometric perspective with no distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room configuration and wall alignment. Minor point deduction for slightly simplified window/opening depths compared to plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D layout precisely, including bathroom fixtures and kitchen appliances.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and clean rendering; monochromatic style aids structural readability.

detected_errors.description: Small window in bathroom is simplified; door swing directions are visually represented as blocks rather than arcs.

summary: A highly faithful geometric translation of the 2D floor plan into a clean, accurate 3D isometric model.
